author: Amelia Murray
title: Coventry BS's latest Poppy Bond pays 2.35pc plus 0.15pc to The Royal British Legion
text: Savings Coventry BS's latest Poppy Bond pays 2.35pc plus 0.15pc to The Royal British Legion The latest addition to the Poppy range pays less than the market leading rate, but customers have the bonus of donating to a worthy cause Coventry BS's Poppy range has donated Â£12m to The Royal British Legion since 2008 Photo: 2015 Getty Images
